org.lightsleep.helper

Interface SqlEntityInfo<E>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JoinInfo, Sql

    public interface SqlEntityInfo<E>
    An interface with a table alias, an entity information and an entity.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E entity()
      Returns the entity that is referenced in expressions.
      EntityInfo<E> entityInfo()
      Returns the entity information.
      default java.util.stream.Stream<SqlColumnInfo> selectedSqlColumnInfoStream(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> names)
      Returns a stream of SqlColumnInfo that is created from the column information to match any of specified names.
      default java.util.stream.Stream<SqlColumnInfo> sqlColumnInfoStream()
      Returns a stream of SqlColumnInfo that is created from all the column information that the entity information own.
      java.lang.String tableAlias()
      Returns the table alias.
